title: font Id
content:
Hi All!  
Does anyone can help me with this font, it seems very known.  
But which one is it?

Thanks a lot

Ro

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [letter.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150424142039/http:/typophile.com/files/letter_0.jpg) | 33.04 KB |
author: rozy_

comments.content: Very low-res, but looks like [ITC Souvenir](http://web.archive.org/web/20150424142039/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/itc/souvenir/). Popular in the 1970s.
